name: Shipwreck (itch) (Reaktori)
description:
Explore the insides of a crashed spaceship and discover it's secrets. 

I made this game for the 40th GM48 jam, themed Discovery. I hope you enjoy playing it!

Credits:

Art, Sound, Programming and Design by Reaktori. Special thanks to Joey for playtesting non-stop for the last hours!

Everything was made during the jam except the font (04b03 by Yuji Oshimoto https://www.dafont.com/04b-03.font) and the  color palette (GORA63 by Biganon https://lospec.com/palette-list/tag/gora63)
